oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Benign Environment and Safe Food
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Asia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The proceedings give an overview of the current status of organic agriculture and organic agriculture research in Asia.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Research Institute of Organic Agriculture, Dankook University
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Research Institute of Organic Agriculture, Korean Organic Farmers Association
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Research Institute of Organic Agriculture, Korean Organic Farmers Association (Ed.) (2004) Benign Environment and Safe Food. Research Institute of Organic Agriculture, Dankook University. Proceedings of 6th IFOAM-Asia Scientific Conference, Yangpyung, Korea, 7.-9. September 2004. [Unpublished]
